Today, Dan tells Jordan about the modern state of affairs with Alex Jones. Shockingly, the episode ends up being mostly about how Alex doesn't understand "archetypes," how everyone is a con man, and how Jordan wants blood and may not be wrong.

==Tidbits==

*Alex trolls Jordan, teases who the next SCOTUS justice will be, so tell your family to listen
*Alex mangles Greek mythology because Hillary is a globalist
*Soros is funding frivolous lawsuits
*Alex pouts about being told not to tease about SCOTUS
*Roger says to call the White House switchboard
*Jordan calls and it's unsatisfying
*Alex has a special guest who knows a lot about DBZ
*Jordan calls for blood
